header_text: You are on a trip to the beach with a close friend. Walking in the sand is making you lose your balance, and you are afraid to fall. You stop walking and look out at the horizon, feeling awe.

elements.text: You are on a trip to the beach with a close friend. Walking in the sand is making you lose your balance, and you are afraid to fall. You stop walking and look out at the water, feeling...
